posts.text:
Howard County has made its stance clear: when it comes to ICE’s inhumane detention centers, the answer is no + hell no.

Today, County Exec Calvin Ball signed emergency legislation revoking the building permit for a privately owned ICE detention facility whose owners attempted to subvert state law.

replies.text: Can we get Washington County to do the same???
They're trying to open up one in Washington county now!
Please back abolishing ICE. You can introduce a Senate companion of the @ramirez.house.gov bill to end ICE/CBP detention. ramirez.house.gov/media/press-...

Do not relent on our request.
Shut down ice!

posts.text:
The witch hunt for federal workers continues.

The American people will suffer thanks to this Administration's callous treatment of the very people who make sure our seniors get their Social Security, that our food and water are safe, and more.

replies.text:
🔥Abolish DHS & abolish ICE🔥

We’re attacked w/ continual gaslighting by the regime & fascists in power & by centrist Ds led by Schumer & Jeffries while we're being abducted, stalked, terrorized, brutalized, threatened, & murdered holding the line www.huffpost.com/entry/democr...

It’s all connected.
Uggghhh…we have to stand in solidarity with fed workers. Those who haven’t yet lost their jobs must hang in there! Help resist from the inside! Thank you for your service!
Then why didn’t you all do something when you had the leverage? You could have forced a provision in one of the funding packages you all just passed!

All Americans are being denied "life, liberty, and the pursuit of happiness" and are suffering because Donald Trump is the president of the country.

Can you give the American people an estimate of time when Donald Trump will be forcibly removed so the suffering will stop?
And why don't you fight to defend us instead of reposting a news article? When will you work for all Marylanders? Maryland deserves better. We need you to do your job now.
Let’s get rid of this entire administration.  That’ll save us some money.  Plus, do a clawback for the money paid to muskrat and his minions since it cost us more than they saved.

posts.text:
Today, we honor Rosa Parks on what would have been her 113th birthday. In refusing to give up her seat on a Montgomery bus, Ms. Parks propelled the Civil Rights movement forward.

May her bravery continue to inspire us all to keep pushing for a nation with justice for all.

replies.text:
Act of Defiance

Rosa Parks was a civil rights activist who sparked the Montgomery bus boycott in 1955 by refusing to give her seat to a white passenger.
     #CivilRights
This act of defiance helped launch the civil rights movement.
#BlackHistory 

Remembering,
on her birthday, Feb 4
Rosa Parks❤️🇺🇸
What are you doing about the arms treaty that expires today?
Use alt text.

posts.text:
Journalists hold power accountable, and this is NOT the time for sweeping layoffs.

When newsrooms like the Washington Post shrink, our democracy suffers.

It’s hard to hold power to account when you’ve laid off hundreds of staffers.

replies.text: Best thing for these journalists is for them to sue.
But if he doesn’t fire everyone how can he write news that makes dictator trump happy?
Use alt text.

posts.text:
As a former Prince George's County State’s Attorney, it was great to meet with State’s Attorneys from across Maryland alongside @vanhollen.senate.gov.

We discussed supporting victims, the opioid crisis, online child safety, and addressing workforce challenges in prosecutors’ offices.

posts.text:
DOGE accessed Americans' private, sensitive information.

We need the Trump Administration accountable for DOGE's reckless actions. There must be a full investigation into this Admin’s mishandling of Social Security data.

replies.text: What is being done about this?  Feels so long ago… but the surveillance and stealing of info has never stopped.
The proper thing to do here is to get arrest warrants out for EVERYONE at DOGE. Each one of those fuckers need to be prosecuted for raiding our private data.
We need Elon Musk in prison and his little Doge incels too

posts.text:
Honored to join the Women’s Missionary Society of the AME Church for a powerful conversation on Black women in politics. 

“Power in Our Hands” reminds us our voices, votes, and leadership shape communities. Grateful to WMS for celebrating faith, purpose, and impact.
